fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We said that more than 500 parks have closed since 2014 due to council budget cuts. We meant to say children’s playgrounds, not parks (Bossy diet advice won’t fix the NHS, 23 January, page 5, Journal). • For any readers still puzzling over the Codeword on 12 January (page 41), the solution – which we omitted to publish in print – can be found at gu.com/p/7qhyj (to be sent a copy, contact the readers’ editor’s office). • Other recently corrected articles include: Tributes paid to South African musician and activist Hugh Masekela James Damore is wrong. It’s fine to discriminate against bigots and bullies 500 years later, scientists discover what probably killed the Aztecs
